statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir="$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')"; model="$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name')"; style="$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name')"; git_branch="$(cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo '')"; git_status="$(cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null && git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' ' || echo '0')"; dir_name="$(basename "$current_dir")"; printf "\033[2m%s\033[0m" "$model"; if [ "$style" != "default" ]; then printf "\033[2m (%s)\033[0m" "$style"; fi; printf "\033[2m in \033[0m"; printf "\033[2m%s\033[0m" "$dir_name"; if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then printf "\033[2m on \033[0m"; printf "\033[2m%s\033[0m" "$git_branch"; if [ "$git_status" != "0" ]; then printf "\033[2m [%s changes]\033[0m" "$git_status"; fi; fi
